plugins.name: CTRLFRK:GRAD
plugins.description:
GRAD gives you unprecedented control over colour transitions through the power of Bezier curves. This sophisticated plugin brings laboratory-grade precision to your gradient work through highly-customisable curves. Manipulate how colours blend across HSB components, visualise transitions in real-time, and achieve interpolation paths that were previously impossible. Perfect for brand work, illustrations, and UI design where colour transitions matter.


  1. Create expressive colour gradients with precise Bezier curve control
  2. Independently manipulate hue, saturation, and brightness curves for nuanced transitions
  3. Apply preset curves (ease-in, ease-out, S-curves) for common gradient effects
  4. Visualise and fine-tune with an interactive interface
  5. Generate exact colour stops based on mathematical interpolation
  6. Apply gradients directly to selected objects or create new gradient rectangles
plugins.tagline: Precision gradient control for the colour obsessed

132857.name: CTRLFRK:GRAD
132857.description:

This sophisticated plugin brings laboratory-grade precision to your gradient work through highly-customisable curves. Perfect for brand work, illustrations, and UI design where colour transitions matter.


  1. Create expressive colour gradients with precise Bezier curve control
  2. Independently manipulate hue, saturation, and brightness curves for nuanced transitions
  3. Apply preset curves (ease-in, ease-out, S-curves) for common gradient effects
  4. Visualise and fine-tune with an interactive interface
  5. Generate exact colour stops based on mathematical interpolation
  6. Apply gradients directly to selected objects or create new gradient rectangles
132857.release_notes: This update delivers key under-the-hood improvements for a more stable and reliable GRAD experience.
132857.tagline: Precision gradient control for the colour obsessed

plugins.name: Section Logger
plugins.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
plugins.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

129666.name: Section Logger
129666.description: ¡No pierdas ni un cambio! Con Section Logger, cada modificación en tus secciones de Figma queda registrada automáticamente. Visualiza los cambios en tiempo real, guarda un historial detallado de tus ediciones y personaliza el diseño con colores que se ajustan a tu estilo. Ideal para equipos que buscan organización, colaboración y eficiencia. ¡Mejora tu flujo de trabajo ahora!
129666.release_notes:
Release Note: Versión 1.1

Nuevas funcionalidades:
1.Soporte de idioma (Español/Inglés):
•Se ha implementado un selector de idioma en la UI del plugin, que permite cambiar entre español e inglés con un switch/slider intuitivo.
•El idioma de la interfaz (títulos, botones y textos) cambia dinámicamente según la selección del usuario.
•El texto de los logs registrados también cambia de idioma, mostrando la información correctamente tanto en español como en inglés, dependiendo del idioma seleccionado.
2.Actualización de sticker:
•Mejora de la gestión de stickers: Ahora, si un sticker ya existe, se actualiza con los nuevos logs en lugar de crear uno nuevo cada vez que se registra una edición.
•Si el sticker ya está presente, su contenido se limpia y se reemplaza con los nuevos logs, garantizando que no haya stickers duplicados.

Mejoras adicionales:
•Se mejoró el posicionamiento dinámico del sticker, asegurando que se mantenga correctamente ubicado en la esquina superior izquierda de la sección.
•Se optimizó el código para hacer el plugin más eficiente y evitar la creación de stickers innecesarios.

Fixes:
•Se solucionó un problema en el que un nuevo sticker se creaba cada vez que se registraba un log, incluso si ya existía uno previamente.
129666.tagline: Transforma tu flujo de trabajo: registra, organiza y visualiza cambios de diseño veloz.

plugins.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
plugins.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.
plugins.tagline: Automate. Validate. Elevate.

127028.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
127028.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access external resources for WCAG contrast checking and design pattern validation.

plugins.name: Outset Pr Invoice Plugin
plugins.description:
Invoice Filler Plugin for Outset PR


This plugin is specifically designed for Outset PR and works exclusively with their internal invoice template in Figma. It automates the process of populating the template with data submitted via the plugin’s form, streamlining the invoicing workflow for the company.


How It Works:


The plugin is built to integrate with a single invoice template used by Outset PR.

Users submit invoice data through the plugin's form.

The plugin then automatically fills the predefined fields in the Outset PR invoice template within Figma.


Limitation for Reviewers:


Since the plugin is tailored for Outset PR's proprietary invoice template, reviewers will not have access to the template for testing.


For Figma Reviewers:


To review the functionality of the plugin, please use mock data in the form. The plugin will generate a dummy page with the entered data displayed.

If you are a member of the Figma team, please fill out the form and review the data generated by the plugin to understand its intended functionality.


Key Features:


Specifically designed for Outset PR’s invoice template, allowing users to quickly populate the template with the required data.

Simplifies the invoicing process for Outset PR by eliminating manual data entry.

Optimized for seamless integration with a single internal template used by the company.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to fill invoices

plugins.name: Diopter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you see how you are using remote components for linked and unlinked libraries. For example, you can find mobile components in a file with only desktop explorations. With a tool like this, you can being spring cleaning now and get your files squeaky clean.


To use this plugin, you'll need to create a personal access token with read-only access to files. I needed that token to be able to get details about file libraries—e.g., library name. The first time you run the plugin, you'll be asked to paste the token.
plugins.tagline: Clearly see which components you're using and where they come from.

127509.description:

plugins.name: Scribe Guard - AI-powered Writing System Validator
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful AI tool that analyzes your text content against your writing system guidelines, ensuring perfect brand consistency and tone of voice alignment.


✨ Key Features

  1. AI-powered content analysis
  2. Writing system validation
  3. Style guide compliance checks
  4. Tone of voice verification
  5. Terminology consistency
  6. Real-time feedback


🚀 How to Use

  1. Upload your Writing System PDF
  2. Enter your ChatGPT API key
  3. Click "Analyze Copy"
  4. Review the detailed analysis


🛠️ What You'll Need

  1. ChatGPT API key
  2. Your writing system guidelines in PDF


🔒 Security Note

Your API key is handled securely and can be saved locally for convenience. All communications are encrypted and only happen through authorized channels.



The tool provides detailed feedback on tone, terminology, and style compliance, helping you maintain perfect brand consistency across all your content. No more manual checking - let AI do the heavy lifting! ✨
plugins.tagline: Validate your text content against writing system guidelines with AI-powered analysis

plugins.name: Figmata
plugins.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.
plugins.tagline: Data-driven design directly in Figma

130087.name: Figmata
130087.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.

plugins.name: Template Manager
plugins.description:
Figma Template Saver


Description:

Effortlessly save and reuse entire Figma designs as templates while preserving frames, text, vectors, components, and precise positioning. This plugin ensures that every detail—fills, strokes, corner radius, and vector data—is accurately stored and replicated when applied to new files.


🔹 **Save any selection as a reusable template**

🔹 **Apply templates across different files with full fidelity**

🔹 **Preserve component instances, nested frames, vectors, and typography**

🔹 **Avoid missing fills or strokes with advanced capture logic**


Streamline your workflow and bring consistency to your designs—save once, apply anywhere! 🚀
plugins.tagline: **"Effortlessly save, reuse, and replicate Figma designs—preserve every detail with precision."**

plugins.name: K Translation
plugins.description:
K Translation is a localization tool designed to simplify the process of translating your Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files.


After installing the plugin, the user uploads an XLIFF file containing translations. The plugin analyzes the file, determines the source language, and lists available target languages.


The user then selects which languages to translate the frame into. To begin the translation, simply select a frame in Figma that contains text elements.


Once the "Create copy" button is pressed, the plugin automatically scans all the text within the frame and creates copies of the frame for each selected target language, effectively localizing your design with just a few click.
plugins.tagline: K Translation: localize Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files in just a few clicks.

103740.name: K Translation
103740.description:
K Translation is a localization tool designed to simplify the process of translating your Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files.


After installing the plugin, the user uploads an XLIFF file containing translations. The plugin analyzes the file, determines the source language, and lists available target languages.


The user then selects which languages to translate the frame into. To begin the translation, simply select a frame in Figma that contains text elements.


Once the "Create copy" button is pressed, the plugin automatically scans all the text within the frame and creates copies of the frame for each selected target language, effectively localizing your design with just a few click.
103740.release_notes: Added the ability to download a file containing texts that were not translated.
103740.tagline: K Translation: localize Figma frames into multiple languages using XLIFF files in just a few clicks.

plugins.name: UX Audit
plugins.description:
Stop memorising and start implementing your knowledge.

A comprehensive tool to analyse & audit frames directly in Figma. The plugin performs accessibility checks, heuristic evaluations, and basic website audits.


Features

Frame Audit

Accessibility Checks: Color contrast analysis, text size validation, touch target size verification

Heuristic Evaluation: Nielsen's 10 heuristics including consistency, system status visibility, user control, and more

Visual Analysis: Color palette and typography consistency checks


Website Audit (Basic)

Basic accessibility and UX scoring

No external API dependencies required

Ready for future enhancement with user-provided API keys

Architecture


This plugin uses a client-side only approach, making it:


✅ Easy to deploy and distribute

✅ No server costs or maintenance

✅ Works immediately for all users

✅ No user data storage concerns
plugins.tagline: Your all in one design critique tool.

139050.name: UX Audit
139050.description:
Stop memorising and start implementing your knowledge.

A comprehensive tool to analyse & audit frames directly in Figma. The plugin performs accessibility checks, heuristic evaluations, and basic website audits.


Features

Heuristic Evaluation: Nielsen's 10 heuristics including consistency, system status visibility, user control, and more

Visual Analysis: Color palette and typography consistency checks


Website Audit (Basic)

Basic accessibility and UX scoring

No external API dependencies required

Ready for future enhancement with user-provided API keys

Architecture


This plugin uses a client-side only approach, making it:


✅ Easy to deploy and distribute

✅ No server costs or maintenance

✅ Works immediately for all users

✅ No user data storage concerns
139050.tagline: Your all in one design critique tool.

plugins.name: Syncalise
plugins.description:
Because life is too short to manually copy translations, Syncalise beams the words from Lokalise straight into your Figma designs. ✨


Syncalise is a Figma plugin that:

  1. Talks to Lokalise via their API 🤝
  2. Lists all your translation keys & languages 🗝️
  3. Lets you slap any translation onto a selected text layer in a single click 🖱️
  4. Helps you annotate & export strings without the usual tears 💧


All that, wrapped in a tiny React app living comfortably inside Figma.


90-second quick start ⏱️

  1. Grab the plugin from Figma Community or clone this repo and build locally (see dev setup below).
  2. Open the plugin inside Figma → you'll land on Settings.
  3. Paste your Lokalise API token and hit Save. (We never send it anywhere except Lokalise – pinky promise.)
  4. Pick a project from the dropdown.
  5. Head over to the Keys tab, select your language, search a key and click it while a Figma text layer is selected.
  6. 💥 Boom – translated! Time to grab a coffee ☕.
plugins.tagline: The "Why-am-I-still-copy-pasting-strings?" Figma plugin

137558.name: Syncalise
137558.description:
Because life is too short to manually copy translations, Syncalise beams the words from Lokalise straight into your Figma designs. ✨


Syncalise is a Figma plugin that:

  1. Talks to Lokalise via their API 🤝
  2. Lists all your translation keys & languages 🗝️
  3. Lets you slap any translation onto a selected text layer in a single click 🖱️
  4. Helps you annotate & export strings without the usual tears 💧


All that, wrapped in a tiny React app living comfortably inside Figma.


90-second quick start ⏱️

  1. Grab the plugin from Figma Community or clone this repo and build locally (see dev setup below).
  2. Open the plugin inside Figma → you'll land on Settings.
  3. Paste your Lokalise API token and hit Save. (We never send it anywhere except Lokalise – pinky promise.)
  4. Pick a project from the dropdown.
  5. Head over to the Keys tab, select your language, search a key and click it while a Figma text layer is selected.
  6. 💥 Boom – translated! Time to grab a coffee ☕.

networkAccess.reasoning: Syncalise needs to access the Lokalise API to fetch projects and translations.

plugins.name: Bulk Text Replacer
plugins.description:
CSV形式のファイルを読み込んで一括置換できます。

1列目に検索対象、2列目に置換内容を記述したCSVファイルを読み込ませて使用して下さい。


手入力で「検索する言葉」と「置換する言葉」の間に「=>」を入れることでも可能です。

例：検索する言葉 => 置換する言葉


You can perform bulk text replacement by importing a CSV file.

The first column should contain the text to search for, and the second column should contain the replacement text.


Alternatively, you can manually enter replacement pairs using the => format.

Example: original text => replacement text
plugins.tagline: Bulk text replacement for Figma, Figjam & Slides.

plugins.name: Component State Mapper
plugins.description:
Tired of getting lost in complex component variants? Struggling to track every possible state, prevent design inconsistencies, and explain component logic to your team?


Introducing State Mapper, the essential Figma plugin that transforms your complex component sets into clear, interactive, and easy-to-understand visual maps. Stop navigating your variants blindfolded and gain a bird's-eye view of your entire component architecture.


With a single click, State Mapper instantly generates a live flowchart of all your variants, showing you exactly how they connect and what properties change between them.


Key Features:


  2. 🗺️ Instant Visual Mapping: Automatically generate beautiful, easy-to-read diagrams from any component set. See the full picture, from simple buttons to complex data tables.
  3. 🔬 Powerful Filtering & Layouts: Is your map too complex? No problem. Isolate exactly what you need by filtering properties and values. Switch between Hierarchical, Graph, and Matrix layouts to find the perfect view.
  4. ⚠️ Smart "Missing State" Detection: Our most powerful feature! State Mapper intelligently analyzes your component's properties and automatically flags potential "holes" or missing variants in your system, helping you prevent bugs before they happen.
  5. 🤝 Seamless Handoff & Documentation: Export your component maps as SVG or PNG to include them directly in your documentation on Confluence, Notion, or Jira. Make sure developers understand the logic perfectly.
  6. 🔄 Live Sync: Keep your map updated in real-time. As you add, remove, or change variants, your map reflects those changes instantly.

Who is it for?


State Mapper is built for meticulous Product Designers, UI/UX Designers, and Design System teams who want to build more robust, error-free, and well-documented components.


Install State Mapper today and bring order, clarity, and intelligence to your design system!
plugins.tagline: Bring clarity to component chaos.

  3. 🔬 Powerful Filtering & Layouts: Is your map too complex? No problem. Isolate exactly what you need by filtering properties and values. Switch between Hierarchical, Graph, and Matrix layouts to find the perfect view.
  4. ⚠️ Smart "Missing State" Detection: Our most powerful feature! State Mapper intelligently analyzes your component's properties and automatically flags potential "holes" or missing variants in your system, helping you prevent bugs before they happen.

plugins.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
plugins.description:
1. Select one or more layers in your Figma file (the plugin will find all text layers within your selection).
  2. Open the plugin and enter your OpenAI API key. If you don't have one: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/4936850-where-do-i-find-my-openai-api-key
  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).
  4. Click "Generate Text". Each selected text layer will be filled with a unique, AI-generated response matching your instruction.
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma text layers with smart, unique AI-generated content.

135957.name: Content Magic Filler with OpenAI
135957.description:
1. Select one or more layers in your Figma file (the plugin will find all text layers within your selection).

  3. Type a prompt or instruction describing the kind of text you want (e.g., “US zip code”, “company name”, “city in Japan”).

plugins.name: Riido
plugins.description:
디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업


피그마와 뤼이도를 연동해 디자이너와 개발자의 작업 흐름을 자연스럽게 연결하세요.

디자이너는 더 이상 뤼이도에 직접 들어가 작업 상태를 수정할 필요 없이, 피그마에서 디자인 작업만 해도 자동으로 뤼이도에 최신 상태가 반영됩니다.

개발자는 언제 어떤 디자인이 완료되었는지 실시간으로 확인할 수 있어, 놓치지 않고 바로 개발을 시작할 수 있습니다.


주요 기능


🔗 Figma 디자인과 작업을 연결

작업과 연결된 프레임, 섹션, 페이지를 플러그인에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

연결된 작업을 클릭하면 해당 디자인으로 이동할 수 있어 맥락 파악이 쉬워집니다.


🔄 Figma에서 바로 작업 상태 업데이트

디자인이 완료되면, Figma 안에서 작업 상태를 ‘완료’로 변경할 수 있어 매번 뤼이도에 접속하지 않아도 됩니다.


🧭 작업 히스토리와 현재 상태 추적

플러그인 안에서 작업 목록, 상태, 담당자, 우선순위 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있어,

디자인과 개발 간에 엇갈림 없이 협업할 수 있습니다


뤼이도와 피그마의 유기적인 연결로

더 빠른 작업 전달, 더 적은 커뮤니케이션 비용, 더 집중된 업무를 경험해보세요.
plugins.tagline: 디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업

139175.name: Riido
139175.description:
디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업

디자이너는 더 이상 뤼이도에 직접 들어가 작업 상태를 수정할 필요 없이, 피그마에서 디자인 작업만 해도 자동으로 뤼이도에 최신 상태가 반영됩니다.

개발자는 언제 어떤 디자인이 완료되었는지 실시간으로 확인할 수 있어, 놓치지 않고 바로 개발을 시작할 수 있습니다.


주요 기능


🔗 Figma 디자인과 작업을 연결

작업과 연결된 프레임, 섹션, 페이지를 플러그인에서 바로 확인할 수 있습니다.

연결된 작업을 클릭하면 해당 디자인으로 이동할 수 있어 맥락 파악이 쉬워집니다.


🔄 Figma에서 바로 작업 상태 업데이트

디자인이 완료되면, Figma 안에서 작업 상태를 ‘완료’로 변경할 수 있어 매번 뤼이도에 접속하지 않아도 됩니다.


🧭 작업 히스토리와 현재 상태 추적

플러그인 안에서 작업 목록, 상태, 담당자, 우선순위 등을 한눈에 확인할 수 있어,

디자인과 개발 간에 엇갈림 없이 협업할 수 있습니다


뤼이도와 피그마의 유기적인 연결로

더 빠른 작업 전달, 더 적은 커뮤니케이션 비용, 더 집중된 업무를 경험해보세요.
139175.tagline: 디자인과 개발 사이, 더 이상 끊기지 않는 협업

plugins.name: Color Explorer
plugins.description:
🎨 What is Color Explorer?

Color Explorer is a smart Figma plugin designed to help designers, early-stage founders, agencies, strategists, DTC operators, and marketers quickly find the perfect color palettes for their brand.


With over 3,000+ curated palettes (increasing everyday), you can preview and apply full-brand color systems to any selected frame or layer—in one click.


🚀 Key Features

  1. Alpha-Safe Mapping: Automatically preserves transparency values (alpha channel)
  2. 3000+ Color Palettes: Handpicked and categorized palettes to match different brand moods and industries
  3. One-Click Apply: Instantly replace all fill/stroke/text colors in your selection
  4. Lightweight and Fast: Designed for speed and real-time creative flow


🔧 Use Cases

  1. Explore visual directions before committing to a brand look
  2. Save time in early-stage design sprints
  3. Quickly swap palettes in Figma without manual editing
  4. Present polished options to clients and stakeholders


💸 One-Time Purchase

Get lifetime access for a one-time fee of $10. No subscription. Free updates forever.
plugins.tagline: One Click to Try 3000+ Color Palettes on Your Design.

plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of design and development services.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Nordy figma plugin
plugins.description:
Image generator designed for professionals, built on ComfyUI

  1. Run a variety of workflows and apps based on ComfyUI.
  2. Connect with Figma to easily automate your creative work.
  3. Browse, select, and launch the app you want — it's easy to create your own.
